answers.answer: Hi,'Vitiligo may be associated with other autoimmune diseases, especially thyroid disease and diabetes mellitus. Other associated autoimmune diseases include pernicious anemia, Addison disease, and alopecia areata.'Consult your doctor to rule these out in your father's case.Any specific foods will not alter the condition.You could read more about this at the following link -http://www.emedicine.com/DERM/topic453.htmLet us know if you need any other information.Regards.
